mapper.select: select user_id, authorities, request_url, ip, locale, result_message, data, create_time, params, data_explain, type, type_explain from ts_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select user_id, authorities, request_url, ip, locale, result_message, data, create_time, params, data_explain, type, type_explain from ts_log order by create_time desc
select data_explain type, count(*) count from ts_log group by data_explain
select user_id, authorities, request_url, ip, locale, result_message, data, create_time, params, data_explain, type, type_explain from ts_log where type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
